name: Panjamapong "PanJ" Sermsawatsri
description: Panjamapong (PanJ) is currently the Chief Technology Officer at Cleverse, a web3-focused venture builder company based in Bangkok, Thailand. He has experience on building software product for more than 10 years. In the past 3 years, he focused on building web3 products which most of them are data-intensive products.
